Section.Catchline: Political activity in behalf of a candidate for judicial office limited.

Subsection.Text: No political party or partisan political organization shall endorse, support, or assist any candidate in a campaign for election to judicial office.

Any person who knowingly, in an individual capacity or as an officer of an organization, violates the provisions of this section is guilty of a misdemeanor of the second degree, punishable as provided in s. 775.082 or s. 775.083.
